subject: Acknowledgment Required: Confirmation of Candidature
snippet: Hello, I hope you are doing well. We are excited to move forward with your application for the position at LTIMindtree. Before proceeding, please review the key details below and provide your
body:
Hello,

I hope you are doing well.

We are excited to move forward with your application for the position at
*LTIMindtree*.

Before proceeding, please review the key details below and provide
your confirmation
by responding to the questions:

   1. This is a Permanent Gen AI Developer.
   2. The job location is Pan India*.*
   3. Client is *LTIMindtree*


*About Pracyva:* Pracyva – constant advancement <https://pracyva.com/>
*Pracyva’s LinekedIn*: PRACYVA: Posts | LinkedIn
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/pracyva-ltd/posts/?feedView=all>

*About LTIMindtree*: LTIMindtree - Technology Consulting and Digital
Solutions Company <https://www.ltimindtree.com/>

Please confirm the following & Share Recent *Photo* along with any *Govt ID
Proof*:

   - What’s is your Total Experience?
   - What’s your Relevant Experience?
   - What are your Primary Skills?
   - What are your Secondary Skills?
   - *What is your current CTC?*
   - *What is your expected CTC for this role?*
   - *Do you accept the stated job location? (Yes/No)*
   - *Are you ready to re-locate? (Yes/No)*
   - *What’s your Official Notice period? (Yes/No)*
   - *Are you serving the Notice Period? If yes then pls mention your LWD:*



Your prompt confirmation is essential to move forward with your candidature
and to share your profile with the client.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

*Gen AI Developer*

2 to 5 years of experience

Ability to quickly adapt to new tools and evolving technologies

Work experience as a Python Developer

Experience on GenAI models and frameworks like RAG LLM models like OpenAI
or similar Lang chain Vector DBs

Expertise in at least one popular Python framework like Django Flask

Good Azure knowledge App Service Azure Functions Storage Accounts Cosmos DB
etc

Familiarity with frontend technologies React JavaScript

Ability to independently handle analysis and coding work

Team spirit

Good problem solving skills

Understanding of unit testing framework
